Description:
Summary of Position:Alcon is looking to hire a Field Service Engineer. To ensure all Alcon equipment at customers’ site and demo equipment's in India are functioning effectively as per the specifications. Instrumentation pre- launch, installation, commissioning, monitoring performance and review at the customer site. Planning PM calls. AMC/CAMC sale and renewals, demo machine installation and commissioning.Key Responsibilities:Install equipment’s as per the standard Alcon protocol.
Complete preventive maintenance routine as scheduled, as well as emergency calls.
Minimize equipment down time  and equipment failure call back.
Achieve service revenue targets as set by the management.
Provide Customer’s satisfaction at all times.
Complete SALSA reporting as per the guideline in a timely manner.
Constantly support sales function with competitive edge of Alcon products.
Value addition to Company’s image, Gain and Share Market information of products and its actual performance.
Assist in the development of the associate Field service engineerMinimum Qualifications:Minimum Qualifications / ExperienceB.E. or diploma in Electronics / Instrumentation / Biomedical
Field service experience of 2-3 years /fresh candidates can be considered depending on the merits
Excellent technical skills to service , repair and maintain the equipments
Excellent written and verbal communication skill
Analytical skill
Public Relations
Conversant with IT/computer system
Written and Spoken fluency in English, local languagePreferred Qualifications/Skills/ExperienceBachelor's Degree in science /Engineering
